H0.text: The energy makes liquid water freeze, as the Sun's released light and heat energy changes water on Earth.

H1.text: The energy makes water vapor from liquid water as the Sun releases light and heat energy that cause changes on Earth.

H2.text: The energy makes clouds release rain, which is how the Sun's light and heat energy change water on Earth.

H3.text: The energy makes water collect into puddles on Earth as a result of the Sun's light and heat energy that cause changes on the planet.

A4.text: The sun (solar energy) drives evaporation of water from oceans, lakes, moisture in the soil, and other sources of water.

A5.text: The amount of light will affect the evaporation. When photons hit the surface area of the liquid they can make individual molecules break free and disappear into the air without any need for additional heat.
